text:
• Szanujemy się nawzajem!
• Traktujemy innych tak, jak sami chcielibyśmy być traktowani.
• Jesteśmy dla siebie przyjaźni i nie krzyczymy!
• Wszystkich traktujemy jednakowo, niezależnie od tego, czy mają umowę z DB, czy są pracownikami tymczasowymi.
• Rozmawiamy ZE sobą zamiast O sobie!
• Jesteśmy koleżeńscy, pracujemy razem i pomagamy sobie nawzajem.
• Trzymamy się czasów przerw.
Dear All,
Once again, I would like to remind you to follow the DBG regulations. Attached I am sending the short version.
PLEASE TAKE A MINUTE AND READ MORE ONCE THE RULES OF DBG.
AGAINST PERSONS NOT FOLLOWING THE RULES, CONSEQUENCES WILL BE TAKEN, INCLUDING DISCIPLINARY DISMISSAL !!!
The most important points:
1. Work shoes and SEP Peeters t-shirt (!!!) are obligatory at work.
2. It is strictly forbidden to wear any jewelry.
trans:
• We respect each other!
• We treat others the way we would like to be treated.
• We are friendly to each other and do not shout!
• We treat everyone equally, regardless of whether they have a contract with DB or are temporary workers.
• We talk WITH each other instead of ABOUT each other!
• We are friendly, we work together and help each other.
• We stick to break times.
Dear All,
Once again, I would like to remind you to follow the DBG regulations. Attached I am sending the short version.
PLEASE TAKE A MINUTE AND READ MORE ONCE THE RULES OF DBG.
AGAINST PERSONS NOT FOLLOWING THE RULES, CONSEQUENCES WILL BE TAKEN, INCLUDING DISCIPLINARY DISMISSAL !!!
The most important points:
1. Work shoes and SEP Peeters t-shirt (!!!) are obligatory at work.
2. It is strictly forbidden to wear any jewelry.
